name: vectorjson
description: O(n) WASM SIMD streaming JSON parser — 900-2000× faster partial JSON for AI SDKs vs Vercel/Anthropic/TanStack

scripts.build:js: bun build src/js/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --minify --sourcemap=external && bun run build:types
scripts.build: bun run build:zig && bun run build:opt && bun run build:js
scripts.test: bun test/phase1.mjs && bun test/phase2.mjs && bun test/parse-result.mjs && bun test/is-complete.mjs && bun test/partial-json.mjs && bun test/zerocopy.mjs && bun test/standards.mjs && bun test/event-parser.mjs && bun test/live-doc.mjs && bun test/large-json.mjs

author: Steven Chong
